contentBlocks.title: General Pool Cover Requirements
paragraphs: Pool covers must be energy efficient and meet minimum efficiency requirements.
Pool covers must be installed in accordance with manufacturer's instructions.
Pool covers must be accessible for maintenance and replacement.
Pool covers must be suitable for the intended use of the pool.

contentBlocks.title: Energy Efficiency Requirements
paragraphs: Pool covers must meet minimum energy efficiency requirements as specified in the NCC.
Pool covers must be suitable for the intended use of the pool.
Pool covers must be installed in accordance with manufacturer's instructions.
Pool covers must be accessible for maintenance and replacement.

contentBlocks.title: Installation Requirements
paragraphs: Pool covers must be installed in accordance with manufacturer's instructions.
Pool covers must be accessible for maintenance and replacement.
Pool covers must be suitable for the intended use of the pool.
Pool covers must be installed by a qualified person.
